parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Unintended Braking (Phantom Braking) in Autopilot and Adaptive Cruise Control Mode
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Unintended braking can cause sudden and unexpected stops, which can lead to accidents, especially in high-traffic conditions, and potentially result in rear-end collisions.
symptoms: The vehicle suddenly applies emergency braking for no reason
often when approaching overpasses at night or in normal driving conditions
causing sudden and unexpected stops.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunctioning lane departure warning system can cause the vehicle to veer off course, potentially leading to accidents or near-misses, especially when driving on highways.
symptoms: The lane departure warning system fails to work properly
especially in rain
shadows
or other normal road and weather conditions
and the vehicle veers right or left unexpectedly
causing the driver to lose control.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Autopilot and Adaptive Cruise Control Software Glitches
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The software glitches can cause the vehicle to malfunction, leading to unintended braking, veering off course, or other unexpected behavior, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The autopilot and adaptive cruise control systems exhibit glitches
such as veering right or left unexpectedly
sudden braking
or failing to respond to road conditions
causing driver frustration and increasing the risk of accidents.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Unintended Speed Reduction or Braking with Adaptive Cruise Control
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden and unexpected reduction in speed or braking can cause accidents, especially if there are vehicles behind the affected vehicle, and can lead to a loss of control or rear-end collisions.
symptoms: The vehicle suddenly slows down or brakes without any visible obstacle or warning
often while using adaptive cruise control or basic cruise control features.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Main Control Unit (MCU) Failure or Freeze
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure or freeze of the MCU can cause the loss of critical safety features, including adaptive cruise control, speedometer, and lane assist, which can lead to accidents or increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The MCU screen goes blank
and critical safety features become inoperable
including adaptive cruise control
speedometer
turn signals
wipers
and lane assist.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Steering Assist and Lane Departure Avoidance System Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering assist and lane departure avoidance system can cause difficulty in steering, increasing the risk of accidents, and potentially leading to loss of control of the vehicle.
symptoms: Reduced steering assist
difficulty turning the wheel
multiple attempts required to make a turn
warnings of reduced steering assist and lane departure avoidance system malfunction
and increased effort required to steer the vehicle.
